CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of a material, which is mentioned in the ratio of 1:3 with PC71BM.
2. PC71BM: This is also the name of a material, which is mentioned in the ratio of 1:3 with PSFDTBT.

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT (Photovoltaic Shoot-Fly-Die-Through-Bucket)
2. PC71BM (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT))
3. TCB (Toluene-based Composite Buffer)
4. EQE (Efficiency of the Quantum Efficiency)
5. 479 nm (wavelength of the light)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property:

1. PSFDTBT (Photovoltaic Shoot-Fly-Die-Through-Bucket)
2. PC71BM (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT))

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Property, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Especially , the device based on a ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM of 1 : 3 ( w / w ) in TCB solutions exhibited the maximum EQE of 72% at 479 nm.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PSFDTBT (Photoluminescence Spectral Full Width at Half Maximum)
2. PC71BM (Polymer-coated 71BM)
3. EQE (Efficiency Quotient Energy)
4. 479 nm (wavelength of maximum EQE)

These entities represent the properties of the device being described in the paragraph, specifically the ratio of PSFDTBT to PC71BM, the maximum EQE value, and the wavelength of maximum EQE.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (Efficiency Quotient Energy) - This entity refers to the value of the energy efficiency of the device.
2. 72% - This entity is the value of the EQE of the device at 479 nm.

So, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. EQE (Efficiency Quotient Energy)
2. 72%

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| EQE (Efficiency Quotient Energy) |
| 72% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
